### Tender Description
The Canadian Armed Forces (CAF) requires a Telecommunications Systems Specialist Level 2 with expertise in Joint Tactical Data Links (JTDL) to provide advice and staff assistance for the Canadian Joint Operations Fusion Laboratory (JOFL). The specialist will ensure the prioritization and coordination of JTDL capabilities to support the Directorate Joint Capability Development (DJCD) within the Canadian Joint Operations Command (CJOC).

### Specific Services Required
The required services include:

* Providing expert advice on JTDL capabilities to support the CAF's operationalization of the CAF JOFL and DJCD within CJOC.
* Assisting with the prioritization and coordination of JTDL capabilities within CJOC facilities within the National Capital Region or other locations as required.
